summary: Just another unnecessary mod by fredlaus - still beautiful though
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffe599][size=4][b][size=6][color=#ffd966]A Fabulous & Unnecessary mod by fredlaus:[/color] [color=#cc0000]#1[/color][/size][/b]
[color=#ffd966]Why unnecessary mods?
Because they make your game beautiful.
You get one more place to live, stack stuff and house your followers.
You will be increasing your self-esteem dramatically.[size=4] He, he.[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#b6b6b6]Tropical Docks is featuring an imperial vessel, not designed by me, but [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59426/?]Markus Liberty[/url] with some help from [u]Tamira[/u] and [u]1shoedpunk[/u]. I guess you will see some of Tamira's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22018]New Plants[/url] as well.
Don't forget to install Soolie's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim Overhaul[/url] too - that is if you want the tropical looks.
My job has been to create the Docks and equip the interior of the Vessel.
I have improved the vessel though.
Now you can teleport to the top of the masts and balance on the ropes and take a dive into the sea if you like.
The interior features an Arcane Enchanter and an Alchemy Lab.
There is a throne for anyone fancying that.
Plenty of space if you like to house some animals.
None of the dock's houses have doors and are not equiped.
If anyone is interested I can take another dive in my older version and see if something has survived my transport in and out of nexusmods.
My other unnecessary mods:[/color]
[/size][/color][color=#ffe599][size=4][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75776/]Mistwatch Twin Tower[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75769/]
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75778/]Mistwatch Supply Ship
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75797/]TS The MIne
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75815/]TS Free Mine Village[/url][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size]
[/size][/color][color=#ffe599]
[/color]
author: fredlaus and friends
